trans-unit.target: （c）2017-2020年Shahin Amiriparian，Maurice Gerczuk，Sandra Ottl，BjörnSchuller：奥格斯堡大学（University of Augsburg） 根据GPLv3发布，有关详细信息，请参阅LICENSE.md文件。

trans-unit.source: DeepSpectrum is a Python toolkit for feature extraction from audio data with pre-trained Image Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs). It features an extraction pipeline which first creates visual representations for audio data - plots of spectrograms or chromagrams - and then feeds them to a pre-trained Image CNN. Activations of a specific layer then form the final feature vectors.
trans-unit.target: DeepSpectrum是一个Python工具箱，用于使用预训练的图像卷积神经网络（CNN）从音频数据中提取特征。它具有提取管道的功能，该管道首先创建音频数据的可视表示形式（频谱图或色谱图的图），然后将它们输入到经过预先训练的Image CNN中。然后，特定层的激活形成最终的特征向量。

trans-unit.source: If you use DeepSpectrum or any code from DeepSpectrum in your research work, you are kindly asked to acknowledge the use of DeepSpectrum in your publications.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在研究工作中使用了DeepSpectrum或DeepSpectrum的任何代码,请您在您的出版物中确认使用DeepSpectrum。

trans-unit.source: Please direct any questions or requests to Shahin Amiriparian (shahin.amiriparian at tum.de) or Maurice Gercuk (maurice.gerczuk at informatik.uni-augsburg.de).
trans-unit.target: 如有任何问题或要求,请与Shahin Amiriparian (shahin.amiriparian at tum.de)或Maurice Gercuk (maurice.gerczuk at informatik.uni-augsburg.de)联系。

trans-unit.source: S. Amiriparian, M. Gerczuk, S. Ottl, N. Cummins, M. Freitag, S. Pugachevskiy, A. Baird and B. Schuller. Snore Sound Classification using Image-Based Deep Spectrum Features. In Proceedings of INTERSPEECH (Vol. 17, pp. 2017-434)
trans-unit.target: S.Amiriparian,M.Gerczuk,S.Ottl,N.Cummins,M.Freitag,S.Pugachevskiy,A.Baird and B.Schuller.使用基于图像的深谱特征的鼾声分类。In Proceedings of INTERSPEECH (Vol.17,pp.2017-434)
